scripts.test:coverage: nyc _mocha test/unit test/int && nyc report -r html && nyc check-coverage
scripts.release:test: set -uex; yarn run test; yarn run build; npm version prerelease; npm publish --tag testing --access public
scripts.release:patch: set -uex; git pull; rm -rf node_modules; yarn; yarn run test:coverage; yarn run test:lint; ./make.sh test:all; npm version patch; git push; npm publish --access public; git push --tags
